context_text: <A> it's really a nuisance to use a keyboard you know you know a mouse is pretty easy to use / <B> mhm / <A> and speech recognition always has the problem of you know if somebody's in your office talking or something like that there's background noise that kind of thing / <B> right / <A> so you know if you really want to ah really want to definitely you know tell your computer do this / <B> mhm / <A> pointing and clicking is easier but but with a handheld device if you want to enter then you know enter the name boston as your destination you know / <B> right
